page.title: 07SECONDARY SCHOOL -WIRKSWORTH
page.content: THE ONLY SECONDARY SCHOOL IN THE AREA IS THE ANTHONY GELL SCHOOL. IT HAS BEEN A COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL FOR 20 YEARS BEING BUILT ON THE SITE OF THE GRAMMAR SCHOOL. THE CURRENT HEADTEACHER IS MR.R.PEARCE WHO HAS ENCOURAGED THE GREATER USE OF THE SCHOOL AND ITS FACILITIES BY THE COMMUNITY, SO MUCH SO THAT THERE IS A LOCAL NEWSPAPER RUN FROM THE SCHOOL, ART AND CRAFT EVENTS TAKE PLACE, SPORTS TOO. ADULTS ARE ENCOURAGED TO TAKE PART IN EXAMINATION LESSONS TO FURTHER THEIR OWN EDUCATION. MANY OF THE THEATRICAL AND MUSICAL EVENTS FOR THE AREA TAKE PLACE AT THE SCHOOL. THE SCHOOL IS RUN BY DERBYSHIRE COUNTY COUNCIL.
